p: Territory of Washington 3rd Judicial District S.S In District Court holding terms At Seattle in King COunty. In the matter of the application of Author Hain for a writ of Habeas Corpus The said Author Hain discusses to the Sheriffs return of the said Writ of Habeas Corpus and excepts to the sufficiency thereof for the following reason, to writ. Because Samuel Greene Eager has no authority or jurisdiction to sentence said Hain to imprisionment on conviction for petty larceny and no auhtority or jurisdiction to enforce the sentence of imprisionment and there under and all the preceedings there under are illegal and vid- Wherefore said Hain prays to be discharged from custody J. M. Hall Attorney for said Author Hain
